35 hawiridi tatendar thayibu 2004-2005 kala simawedi simbabwe kandayame nayakathwaya daru athara ohu test tharaga 28 kadi shathakayak saha ardha shathaka 12 k samaga mulu lakunu 1546 kda ekdina tharaga 150 kadi shathaka dekak saha ardha shathaka 22 k samaga mulu lakunu 3393 kda laba thibe. 2012 wasaren pasuwa ohuta simbabwe jathika kandayame sthanayak himi nowuni.

dakunu indiya sinamawa thula nitharama pahe wirayan ha wirawariyan dakinnata labenawa.me athurin me dinawala apa hamuwata paminena aluthma wirawariya thamayi shriya saran.shriya me dawaswala satan puhunuwim wala niratha wenawa.aya melesa puhunuwim karanuye indiyawe kerala pranthayata aawenika wu ‘kalari‘ nam maranthika satan kalawaki.aya raja kumarikawage charithayata pana powana me sinama sithuwama namin “chandra“ wenawa.meki sinama siththama nishpadanaya karamin adhyakshanaya karanu labanne rupa ayiyar wisinuyi.satan puhunuwim atharathura kamara kachaye satahan wu rupa ramu kihipayaki me………

mathara kudawallen dhiwara karmanthayata giya bahudina yathrawaka siti dhiwarayan hayadenakuta wenath yathrawakin pamini dasadenaku wisin pereda (15) rathri pahara di atha.bahudina yathrawe siti dhiwarayan dedenakuta pihiyakin ana thuwala sidukara muhudata dama athayi da polisiya pawasayi.pasuwa bahudina yathrawata nanguna anek pudgalayan dasadena bahudina yathrawe siti pudgalayan hatharadena da ragena palagos athayi pawase.”thejan” namathi me bahudina yathrawe siti dhiwarayan hayadenagen siwdenaku anek yathrawe siti dasadena samanga oostreliyawata ho wenath ratakata palagos athayi thamanta thorathuru labunu bawath, me sambandhayen wishesha parikshanayak pawathwana bawath mathara pradesha bhara usas polis niladhariyeku “dinamina” ta pawasiya.me dhiwarayan dedena pasuwa wishala rijifom kaballaka elli pawemin sitina awasthawe wideshiya naukawak wisin beragena atha.
dugathigami wu mewannan ee sthanawalin iwath kirima da pahasu natha.
